69
70
71
72VOID
73SetCrc (
74 IN OUT EFI_TABLE_HEADER *Hdr
75 )
76/*++
77
78Routine Description:
79
80 Updates the CRC32 value in the table header
81
82Arguments:
83
84 Hdr - The table to update
85
86Returns:
87
88 None
89
90--*/
91{
92 SetCrcAltSize (Hdr->HeaderSize, Hdr);
93}
94
95VOID
96SetCrcAltSize (
97 IN UINTN Size,
98 IN OUT EFI_TABLE_HEADER *Hdr
99 )
100/*++
101
102Routine Description:
103
104 Updates the CRC32 value in the table header
105
106Arguments:
107
108 Hdr - The table to update
109
110Returns:
111
112 None
113
114--*/
115{
116 Hdr->CRC32 = 0;
117 Hdr->CRC32 = CalculateCrc((UINT8 *)Hdr, Size);
118}
119
120
121BOOLEAN
122CheckCrc (
123 IN UINTN MaxSize,
124 IN OUT EFI_TABLE_HEADER *Hdr
125 )
126/*++
127
128Routine Description:
129
130 Checks the CRC32 value in the table header
131
132Arguments:
133
134 Hdr - The table to check
135
136Returns:
137
138 TRUE if the CRC is OK in the table
139
140--*/
141{
142 return CheckCrcAltSize (MaxSize, Hdr->HeaderSize, Hdr);
143}
144
145
146
147
148BOOLEAN
149CheckCrcAltSize (
150 IN UINTN MaxSize,
151 IN UINTN Size,
152 IN OUT EFI_TABLE_HEADER *Hdr
153 )
154/*++
155
156Routine Description:
157
158 Checks the CRC32 value in the table header
159
160Arguments:
161
162 Hdr - The table to check
163
164Returns:
165
166 TRUE if the CRC is OK in the table
167
168--*/
169{
170 UINT32 Crc;
171 UINT32 OrgCrc;
172 BOOLEAN f;
173
174 if (Size == 0) {
175 //
176 // If header size is 0 CRC will pass so return FALSE here
177 //
178 return FALSE;
179 }
180 if (MaxSize && Size > MaxSize) {
181 DEBUG((D_ERROR, "CheckCrc32: Size > MaxSize\n"));
182 return FALSE;
183 }
184
185 // clear old crc from header
186 OrgCrc = Hdr->CRC32;
187 Hdr->CRC32 = 0;
188 Crc = CalculateCrc((UINT8 *)Hdr, Size);
189
190 // set restults
191 Hdr->CRC32 = OrgCrc;
192
193 // return status
194 f = OrgCrc == (UINT32) Crc;
195 if (!f) {
196 DEBUG((D_ERROR, "CheckCrc32: Crc check failed\n"));
197 }
198
199 return f;
200}
201
202
203UINT32
204CalculateCrc (
205 UINT8 *pt,
206 UINTN Size
207 )
208{
209 UINTN Crc;
210
211 // compute crc
212 Crc = 0xffffffff;
213 while (Size) {
214 Crc = (Crc >> 8) ^ CRCTable[(UINT8) Crc ^ *pt];
215 pt += 1;
216 Size -= 1;
217 }
218 Crc = Crc ^ 0xffffffff;
219 return (UINT32)Crc;
220}
221
